title: kOLi kUgitallA
sahitya:
kOLi kUgitallA lakSmI lOlanallade anyarArillavendu


caraNam 1    modala jAvadali mukundanendu kUgi eraDali shrI venkaTAdriyendu 
uraga giriya vAsa yAdavakula kolla cadura callapilli rAyanalladillavendu
    caraNam 2    mUru jAvadali murAriyendu kUgi nAkaralli nArAyaNayenalu 
kSIrAbdhiya vAsa lakSmIpati kOnErivAsa venkaTakrSNa rAyanendu
    caraNam 3    parama puruSa adhArabhUta karuNada punjanu jagadAdi tA kamala 
sambhava mukhya kAruNya mUruti vimalakApura timma rAyanalladillavendu
    caraNam 4    rekkeya bicci pasarisi Dangura hoidu kokkanu mEle negahikoLuta 
cakkane kEri kEriyaguNTa sAguta mukkundanallade anyarArillavendu
    caraNam 5    jadu jAvadali anantanenthu kUgi araralli aLagAdrIshayendu 
eraLalli kAshiya bindu mAdhava eNTake purandara viTTalarAyanendu
